short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chirpy filter that removes negative content using IBM Tone Analyzer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An unobtrusive filter to remove negative content developed by Chirpy.

Current use is limited to Twitter, with plans to make Chirpy usable on most popular websites. 

Sign up on Chirpy to gain access to this extension. On Chirpy you can add words to a customizable list that allows our in house algorithm to detect and filter content containing the blocked words. You also gain access to statistics on what kind of content were blocked and when. 

https://www.chirpyapp.net
